snippet: The third Hangout in our London 2012 series was with the U.S. Olympic long-distance runner Shalane Flanagan, The Times's Ken Belson, runner Bob Sherman and Mary Wittenberg, president of New York Road Runners.
abstract: The third Hangout in our London 2012 series was with the U.S. Olympic long-distance runner Shalane Flanagan, The Times's Ken Belson, runner Bob Sherman and Mary Wittenberg, president of New York Road Runners.

headline.main: Video: Google+ Hangout on Marathon Running
